gameplayModel

Class Bomb

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameplayModel.GridObject
      • gameplayModel.AnimatedObject
        • gameplayModel.Bomb

  • public class Bomb
extends AnimatedObject
    This class define the bomb which is the main weapon used by the bomberman. It controls the explosion time, animation effects, bombing range radius, triggering methods, and it also contains trigger methods for other events when the bomb is blasted
    Author:
    Chao Yue, Olivier Laforest

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bomb

        public Bomb(int x,
    int y)
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinates of location of the bomb
        y - the y-coordinates of location of the bomb

      • Bomb

        public Bomb(int range,
    int x,
    int y,
    int timer,
    int right,
    int left,
    int down,
    int up)
        Parameters:
        range - the effective range of the bomb
        x - the x-coordinates of location of the bomb
        y - the y-coordinates of location of the bomb
        timer - the amount of time before it explode counting from when it's being placed by bomberman
        right - the effective range above the bomb
        left - the effective range below the bomb
        down - the effective range on the left of the bomb
        up - the effective range on the left of the bomb
